doc.previous: The Lions formerly the Cats represent Johannesburg North West and Mpumalanga in the Southern Hemisphere s Super Rugby competition which includes teams from South Africa Australia and New Zealand The Golden Lions compete in the Currie Cup which they have won on ten occasions
